  1. Tools

    1. install ng (Angular CLI): npm install -g @angular/cli
    2. initialize new project and use scss as stylesheet: ng new my-app — — style=scss
    3. install common modules:
      1. material: npm install --save @angular/material @angular/cdk @angular/animations
      2. hammerjs (gesture recognition): npm install --save hammerjs
      3. flex-layout (not recommend): npm install --save @angular/flex-layout
    4. Go to index.html import common code and stylesheet
      1. google material font: <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons" rel="stylesheet">
      2. font-awesome: <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://use.fontawesome.com/releases/v5.1.0/css/all.css" integrity="sha384-lKuwvrZot6UHsBSfcMvOkWwlCMgc0TaWr+30HWe3a4ltaBwTZhyTEggF5tJv8tbt" crossorigin="anonymous">
